home.description: Discover the power of AI-driven investments and secure your financial future.

about.title: About AIBank Investments
about.missionText: Our mission is to democratize access to sophisticated investment strategies, making them available to everyone, not just the ultra-wealthy or institutional investors.
about.teamText: Led by a diverse group of experts in finance, technology, and artificial intelligence, our team is committed to pushing the boundaries of what's possible in the world of investments.
about.technologyText: At the heart of AIBank Investments is our proprietary AI engine. This advanced system analyzes vast amounts of financial data in real-time, identifying patterns and opportunities that human analysts might miss.
about.joinText: Whether you're a seasoned investor or just starting out, AIBank Investments has the tools and expertise to help you achieve your financial goals. Join us on this exciting journey into the future of finance.

whitepaper.title: AIBank Investments Whitepaper
whitepaper.description: Our comprehensive whitepaper details the technology, methodology, and vision behind AIBank Investments. Dive deep into how we're revolutionizing the world of finance with AI.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.formDescription: Have questions about AIBank Investments? We're here to help. Fill out the form, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.name: Name

interest.title: Join AIBank Investments
interest.description: Be among the first to experience the future of AI-driven investments. Sign up now for updates and early access opportunities.
interest.thankYou: Thank you for your interest in AIBank Investments. Your registration is complete.
interest.tokenInstructions: Please keep this token safe. You'll need it for future communications and potential early access opportunities.
